00030 namespace Perseus {
00031   class buffer_area {
00032   public:
00033     buffer_area(size_t size, size_t length)
00034       : _size(size)
00035       , _length(length)
00036       , _buf(size*length, 0) {}    
00037     size_t size() const { return _size; }
00038     size_t length() const { return _length; }    
00039     unsigned char* get_buffer_at(size_t i) { return &_buf.front() + i*length(); }
00040   private:
00041     size_t _size;
00042     size_t _length;
00043     std::vector<unsigned char> _buf;
00044   } ;  
00045 
00046   class input_queue : private boost::noncopyable {
00047   private:
00048     //
00049     class transfer_data : private boost::noncopyable {
00050     public:
00051       typedef boost::shared_ptr<transfer_data> sptr;
00052       transfer_data(libusb_transfer* t_,
00053                     size_t           idx_,
00054                     bool             cancelled_,
00055                     input_queue*     iq_)
00056         : t(t_)
00057         , idx(idx_)
00058         , cancelled(cancelled_)
00059         , iq(iq_) {}
00060 
00061       static sptr make(libusb_transfer* t_,
00062                        size_t           idx_,
00063                        bool             cancelled_,
00064                        input_queue*     iq_) {
00065         return sptr(new transfer_data(t_,idx_,cancelled_,iq_));
00066       }
00067 
00068       libusb_transfer* t;
00069       size_t           idx;
00070       bool             cancelled;
00071       input_queue*     iq;
00072     } ;    
00073     typedef std::vector<transfer_data::sptr> queue;
00074 
00075   public:
00076     typedef boost::shared_ptr<input_queue> sptr;
00077 
00078     input_queue(callback::sptr cb,
00079                 size_t size,
00080                 size_t length,
00081                 libusb::device_handle::sptr device_handle,
00082                 boost::uint8_t endpoint)
00083       : _cb(cb)
00084       , _buf(size, length)
00085       , _idx_expected(0)
00086       , _cancelling(false)
00087       , _completed(false) {
00088       for (size_t i=0; i<length; ++i) {
00089         transfer_data::sptr td(transfer_data::make(libusb_alloc_transfer(0), i, false, this));
00090         ASSERT_THROW(td->t != 0);
00091         _queue.push_back(td);
00092         libusb_fill_bulk_transfer(_queue.back()->t,
00093                                   device_handle->get(),
00094                                   endpoint,
00095                                   _buf.get_buffer_at(i),
00096                                   _buf.size(),
00097                                   libusb_transfer_cb_fn(transfer_callback),
00098                                   td.get(),
00099                                   80*length);
00100       }
00101       BOOST_FOREACH(transfer_data::sptr& td, _queue)
00102         libusb_submit_transfer(td->t);
00103     }
00104 
00105     bool check_completed() {
00106       BOOST_FOREACH(const transfer_data::sptr& td, _queue) {
00107         // std::cerr << "check_completed " << (td->cancelled ? "cancelled" : "ok") << std::endl;
00108         if (not td->cancelled) return false;
00109       }
00110       _completed= true;
00111       return _completed;
00112     }
00113     bool is_cancelling() const { return _cancelling; }
00114     bool is_completed() const { return _completed; }
00115 
00116     virtual ~input_queue() {
00117       _cancelling= true;
00118       BOOST_FOREACH(transfer_data::sptr& td, _queue)
00119         libusb_cancel_transfer(td->t);
00120       // wait up to 5 seconds until everything is cancelled
00121       LOG_INFO("wait_cancel: ");
00122       for (size_t i=0; i<50 && not is_completed(); ++i)
00123         usleep(100*1000);
00124       LOG_INFO("... cancelled");
00125       // !!! TO BE CHECKED !!!
00126       while (not is_completed()) {
00127         LOG_INFO("EXTRA WAITING");
00128         usleep(100*1000); 
00129       }
00130       BOOST_FOREACH(transfer_data::sptr& td, _queue)
00131         libusb_free_transfer(td->t);
00132       LOG_INFO("~input_queue end");
00133     }
00134 
00135     static sptr make(callback::sptr cb,
00136                      size_t size,
00137                      size_t length,
00138                      libusb::device_handle::sptr device_handle,
00139                      boost::uint8_t endpoint) {
00140       return sptr(new input_queue(cb, size, length, device_handle, endpoint));
00141     }
00142 
00143     static void transfer_callback(libusb_transfer *transfer) {
00144       transfer_data* td = (transfer_data*)(transfer->user_data);
00145 #if 0
00146       std::cerr << "transfer_callback " << int(transfer) << " " << int(transfer->user_data) 
00147                 << " status=" << int(transfer->status) << " idx=" 
00148                 << td->idx << " idx_expected="
00149                 << td->iq->idx_expected() << " "
00150                 << transfer->actual_length << " " << transfer->length
00151                 << std::endl;
00152 #endif
00153       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(td->iq->_mutex);
00154 
00155       if (td->iq->is_cancelling()) {
00156         td->cancelled = true;
00157         td->iq->check_completed();
00158         return;
00159       }
00160       switch (transfer->status) {
00161       case LIBUSB_TRANSFER_COMPLETED: {
00162         if (td->idx == td->iq->idx_expected()) {
00163           if (transfer->actual_length == transfer->length) {
00164             if (td->iq->_cb)
00165               td->iq->_cb->operator()(transfer->buffer, transfer->length);
00166           }
00167         }
00168       } break;
00169       case LIBUSB_TRANSFER_TIMED_OUT:
00170         break; // ->resubmit
00171       case LIBUSB_TRANSFER_NO_DEVICE:
00172         td->iq->_cancelling= true;
00173       default:
00174         td->cancelled = true;
00175         td->iq->check_completed();
00176         return;
00177       }      
00178       td->iq->increment_idx_expected();
00179       libusb_submit_transfer(transfer);
00180     }
00181 
00182     size_t idx_expected() const { return _idx_expected; }
00183     size_t increment_idx_expected() {
00184       _idx_expected = ((1+_idx_expected) % _buf.length());
00185       return _idx_expected;
00186     }
00187 
00188   protected:
00189   private:
00190     callback::sptr _cb;
00191     buffer_area    _buf;
00192     queue          _queue;
00193     size_t         _idx_expected;
00194     bool           _cancelling;
00195     bool           _completed;
00196     boost::mutex   _mutex;
00197   } ;
00198 } // namespace Perseus
00199 #endif // _input_queue_hpp_cm120404_
